Question:
Which parameters can be modified to adjust the detection performance?
Answer:
The following parameters can be adjusted.
Adjust touch judgement threshold value and hysteresis
Set ON/OFF and execution interval of drift correction (correction processing to make reference count value follow fluctuations in sensor count value due to external factors)
Long Touch Cancel ON/OFF (increase reference to sensor count value when specified ON number is reached) and set execution interval.
Positive Noise Filter ON/OFF (judge as ON when specified ON number is reached) and cycle.
Negative Noise Filter ON/OFF (judge as OFF when specified OFF number is reached) and cycle.
After adjusting the parameters to meet your system needs, make sure you fully evaluate operations before implementation.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
